short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TAMI help you read text content fast with out additional effort.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Listen to websites with TAMI.

If you love to read but have a busy schedule with no time to read or prefer audio content, then TAMI is for you.

TAMI allows people to understand the information by listening which makes content easier to retain without having to scroll for long.
